title: Savage Attacks
content:
suggest. Unlike critical hits, savage attacks does not increase the damage from non-weapon sources like sneak attack, smite, hunters mark, flaming weapon etc Note : it does not however affect unarmed strikes. It is linked entirely to weapon based attacks. Other Notes & Tips go here.
